name: Washed Up (Plague of Minds)
description: Washed Up is a platformer created by the Plague of Minds team for the Completion Jam for December 2020.  The theme of the jam was "Out of Place". This game's main character is a fish out of water.  Guide our fishy friend through multiple obstacles and avoid poison spore projectiles cast by fiendish fungi.  All assets (art, code, music) were created during the jam by the team.  We hope you enjoy our entry and please take a few moments to leave us some comments about what you liked and also what you think could have been improved.
